Recipe.Tofu Manchurian: Ingredients: Need more Indo Chinese recipes?, How to make tofu manchurian in air fryer?, How to make it in oven?, How to make manchurian gravy?, Tofu manchurian Recipe, , Equipment, , - wok, - air fryer or oven, , , Tofu cubes, - extra firm tofu, - corn flour/tapioca starch/arrowroot, - oil, - salt optional if soy sauce is already too salty., - soya sauce, Sauce mix, - tomato sauce, - hot chilli sauce adjust as per your taste, - sweet & sour sauce optional, - soy sauce adjust as per your taste, vegetable mix, - sesame oil or any vegetable oil, - sliced ginger, - sliced garlic, - Onion finely  chopped, - Green bell peppers chopped, - Red bell peppers chopped, - Salt as per taste (Adjust as per salt in Soy sauce), - black pepper powder, , refer to recipe card for details., , Need more Indo Chinese recipes?, , , Cabbage manchurian recipe | air fryer veg manchurian, , Air fryer gobi Manchurian | cauliflower manchurian, , Veg chowmein, , Veg fried rice, , Soya chunks manchurian | Air fryer soya manchurian, , authentic Indian curry sauce recipe, , , How to make tofu manchurian in air fryer?, , Use the below steps to prepare pieces in air fryer., , , Cut the Tofu in cubes. Add tapioca starch/corn flour, salt, soy sauce and Oil., , , , , , Place the pieces in the air fryer basket. You may use the steamer sheets or baking sheets with holes., , , , , , In a preheated airfryer (190C/375F for 5 minutes) Cook in air fryer at 190 deg C for 10-11 minutes. Stir the pieces in the basket once between the cooking, , , , , Keep it aside and add to wok once gravy is ready., , How to make it in oven?, , Use the below steps to prepare pieces in fan forced oven., , , After tossing the tofu pieces in the starch mix, spread them on a tray lined with baking sheet, , , , , , Bake in an oven(pre heated for 10 minutes)  at 190 deg C(fan forced) for 15-16 minutes., , , How to make manchurian gravy?, , Steps for manchurian gravy are common whether you fry the pieces, bake in an oven or air fry pieces., , , Heat oil in a wok, add ginger, garlic and chilli. Add onion,salt cook on medium flame for few minutes.Now, add rest of veggies., , , , , Add the sauces with pepper and let it cook for few minutes., , , , , Add the tofu cubes to the mix, , , , , , , , (optional)If you prefer a thin gravy, then this is the time to add 2 teaspoon corn flour/tapioca starch mixed with 1 cup water and let it boil., , , , , Garnish with sesame seeds and chopped spring onion greens., , , , , , Print Recipe, , 5, from, 3, votes, , , Tofu manchurian Recipe, , , Tofu manchurian is a great companion for hakka noodles or fried rice.Perfect for vegans or those who want to avoid paneer., , , Prep Time, 15, minutes, , mins, Cook Time, 30, minutes, , mins, Total Time, 25, minutes, , mins, , , Course:, Appetizer, Cuisine:, Indo-Chinese, Keyword:, dry tofu chilli, dry tofu manchurian, indo chinese starter, indo-chinese, tofu chilli, tofu manchurian, , Servings:, 4, , Author:, bhavana bhatia, , Equipment, wok, air fryer or oven, , Tofu cubes, 300, , grams, , extra firm tofu, 2, , teaspoon, , corn flour/tapioca starch/arrowroot, 2, , teaspoon, , oil, ½, , tsp., , salt, , optional if soy sauce is already too salty., 2, , tsp., , soy sauce, Sauce mix, 1, , tablespoon, , tomato ketchup, 1, , tablespoon, , hot chilli sauce, , adjust as per your taste, 1, , tablespoon, , sweet & sour sauce, , optional, 1, , tablespoon, , soy sauce, , adjust as per your taste, vegetable mix, 2, , tablespoon, , sesame oil, , or any vegetable oil, 1, , tbsp., , sliced ginger, 1, , tbsp., , sliced garlic, 1, , Onion, , chopped or ½ cup, ½, , Green capsicum, , chopped or ½ cup, ½, , Red capsicum, , chopped or ½ cup, Salt as per taste, , Adjust as per salt in Soy sauce, ½, , teaspoon, , pepper, , crushed, Garnish, ½, , teaspoon, , Sesame seeds, ¼, , cup, , green onions, , chopped,  Instructions: Prep tofu pieces in Air fryer, Cut the Tofu in cubes,Add tapioca starch/cornflour,salt,soy sauce and Oil., Place the marinated tofu pieces in the air fryer basket. You may use the steamer sheets or baking sheets with holes., In a preheated airfryer (190C/375F for 5 minutes) Cook in air fryer at 190 deg C for 10-11 minutes. Stir the pieces in the basket once between the cooking, Keep it aside and add to wok once gravy is ready., Prep tofu pieces in Oven, After tossing the tofu pieces in the starch mix, spread them on a tray lined with baking sheet, Bake into oven(preheated for 5 minutes) at 190 deg C(fan forced) for 15-16 minutes., Steps for tofu manchurian gravy, Heat oil in a wok, add ginger, garlic and chilli. Add onion, cook on medium flame for few minutes. Now, add rest of veggies., Add the sauces with pepper., Add the cubes to the gravy. Toss them well. let it cook for few minutes., If you prefer a thin gravy, then this is the time to add 2 teaspoon corn flour/tapioca starch mixed with 1 cup water and let it boil., Garnish with sesame seeds and chopped spring onions., , , Notes, The spice is as per your taste, hence please adjust the chilli sauce,soy sauce accordingly., , Nutrition, Serving:, 4, g, , Variations, , The spice is as per your taste, hence please adjust the chilli sauce, soy sauce and red chili powder accordingly. You can use air, fried baked tofu, or fried tofu as per your choice in the above recipe., , Storage, , You can air fry pieces and keep it in refrigerator for 2-3 days. Recipe.Bread Manchurian: Ingredients: , , , , 4, , how to make bread manchurian with step by step photo:, , , , , 5, , notes:, , , , , , bread manchurian recipe | how to make dry bread manchurian recipe, with step by step photo and video recipe. indian street food is popular not only in india, but all over over the world for its full of flavour and spice level. one such fusion cuisine is the famous indo chinese cuisine in which manchuri recipes are king of it. manchuri recipe can be made with combination of vegetables or with deep fried bread balls for, bread manchurian recipe, ., , in this recipe, i have basically adapted my previous, cabbage manchurian, and i have replaced the veggie balls with bread balls. while i was preparing i personally felt this recipe is much easier to prepare as compared to the former. also the deep fried snacks were more tastier as compared to deep fried veggie balls. hence my vote is certainly for this bread-based recipe. however deep frying the bread can be tricky and it may perhaps absorb more oil, if it is not shaped firmly and properly. but the rule of thumb for me is, whenever the bread meets hot oil, the result is always amazing. you name it, bread rolls, , , bread pakora, and, bread vada, are always popular choice., , , while the recipe is fairly easy to prepare, yet some easy tips and suggestions for, bread manchurian, . firstly, i would heavily recommend to use the traditional white sandwich bread slices as compared to the brown or wholemeal bread. basically plain flour based bread are more easy to shape and less accidents while deep frying. secondly, if you do not wish to deep fry these bread balls, you can even pan fry / bake or shallow fry too. in addition you can even use appe pan to fry these balls with a half tsp of oil in in each appe, mould, . lastly, i have prepared the dry version of manchuri, it can also be prepared with gravy too. refer my, gobi manchurian gravy recipe, for more info about the gravy., , finally do visit my other, indo chinese street food recipes collection, with this post of, bread manchurian recipe, . it includes recipes like, gobi manchurian, , , paneer chilli, , , veg crispy, , , hot and sour soup, , , veg manchow, , , cabbage manchurian, , , veg manchurian, , , gobi chilli, and, paneer kathi roll, . further to this i would like to highlight my other similar 1, , tsp, , corn flour, ▢, ¼, , cup, , water,  Instructions: , firstly, cut 3 slice bread and transfer to a blender., blend to a fine powder (breadcrumbs) without adding any water., transfer the prepared bread crumbs into a large mixing bowl., also add 1 cup cabbage, ½ cup carrot, ½ tsp chilli powder and ½ tsp ginger garlic paste., further add ¼ cup corn flour, ¼ tsp salt and 2 tbsp water., combine by squeezing out cabbage well and form a dough., now grease hand with oil and prepare round sized small balls., deep fry in hot oil till it turns golden brown., now add fried manchurian balls, to the sauce and mix well., finally, bread manchurian is ready to serve by garnishing with chopped spring onions., , , , , , , , , , , , Tried this recipe?, Mention, @HebbarsKitchen, or tag, #hebbarskitchen, !, , how to make bread manchurian with step by step photo:, , , firstly, cut 3 slice bread and transfer to a blender., , , blend to a fine powder (breadcrumbs) without adding any water., , , transfer the prepared bread crumbs into a large mixing bowl., , , also add 1 cup cabbage, ½ cup carrot, ½ tsp chilli powder and ½ tsp ginger garlic paste., , , further add ¼ cup corn flour, ¼ tsp salt and 2 tbsp water., , , combine by squeezing out cabbage well and form a dough., , , now grease hand with oil and prepare round sized small balls., , , deep fry in hot oil or preheat and bake at 180 degree celsius for 30 minutes or till manchurian balls turn crisp and gets cooked well completely from inside., , , stir occasionally, keeping the flame on medium till the manchurian balls turn golden and crisp., , , drain off the fried manchurian balls over kitchen paper and keep aside., , , now in a large kadai heat 3 tsp oil and saute 3 clove garlic, 1 green chilli., , , also saute 2 tbsp spring onions, 2 tbsp onion., , , additionally, add ¼ sliced capsicum and saute well., , , further add 2 tbsp, tomato sauce, , 1 tsp chilli sauce, 1 tbsp vinegar, 1 tbsp soy sauce, ¼ tsp pepper and ¼ tsp salt., , , mix on high flame till the sauce thickens., , , further, prepare corn flour slurry by mixing 1 tsp cornflour water in ¼ cup water., , , get to a boil by mixing continuously and till the gravy slightly thickens and turns glossy., , , now add fried manchurian balls, 2 tbsp spring onions and mix gently., , , finally,, bread manchurian, is ready to serve by garnishing with Wash it thoroughly under tap water . Cover and let it sit for 10 minutes for it to soften and double its size ., Meanwhile dice and pulse the vegetables in a food processor or chop it /grate it finely ., Now take a bowl, add in the the vegetables, soften poha or cooked rice, rice flour and all the mentioned seasoning., Make lime size small balls. The balls should be smooth and soft yet firm enough so that they do not fall apart. Add 1-2 tablespoon of flour if you are in doubt. At this point you can deep fry them or use paniyaram pan to cook . Heat up the paniyaram/appe pan. When warm ,brush each cavity lightly with oil. Place the prepared balls in the pan and let it cook on low to medium heat for 5 -6 minutes rotating mid way until golden brown . Take them out of the pan and keep aside ., For the gravy, Heat oil in a heavy bottom pan on medium heat. Once warm add in ginger garlic, sautee for30 seconds add in the onions, bell peppers. Sautee for 30 seconds. Add in the mention sauces. Cook for 10 seconds. Now add in 1 cup of water, pepper and let the gravy come to a simmer . Meantime, in a bowl whisk the rice flour with ½ cup of water. Once the gravy starts simmering, add in the prepared rice flour slurry slowly by one hand and whisking the gravy with a spoon by another hand until incorporated well ., The gravy will start to thicken within a minute. Switch off the flame . Taste test and then add salt if needed., Just before serving warm up the gravy and add Manchurian balls to it. Serve piping hot with rice or noodles., , , Notes, Add salt towards the end after tasting the gravy as all sauces have salt., You can finely chop or use food processor to grate veggies for Manchurian balls ., If you do not have rice flour substitute it with cornstarch / all purpose flour, Substitute poha/beaten rice with cooked rice ., , Nutrition, Serving:, 4, g, |, Calories:, 39, kcal, |, Carbohydrates:, 5, g, |, Protein:, 1, g, |, Fat:, 1, g, |, Sodium:, 330, mg, |, Potassium:, 73, mg, |, Fiber:, 1, g, |, Vitamin A:, 1545, IU, |, Vitamin C:, 3.1, mg, |, Calcium:, 9, mg, |, Iron:, 0.4, mg, , , , , Tried this recipe?, Click photo & send it, @carveyourcraving, or tag, #carveyourcraving, on Facebook or Instagram to be featured!, , Adjust spice to your preference . This recipe has a spice level of 3, 1 being mild and 5 being spicy ., , A quick update about brands I have used here –, , Though it does not matter which brand you are using, these are the following ones I have used for this recipe –, , Norpro aebleskiver pan –  paniyaram /appe pan from amazon., , Ching’s dark soy sauce, I like tamari sauce too. Update as on 2018 – I use kikomon ‘s low sodium natural Soy Sauce, , Mitchell’s green chilly sauce ., , Nakano’s rice vinegar ., , Inchin’s bamboo garden vegetable noodles., , We do not like thick noodles, I love using inchin’s noodles found at indian grocery store or thin whole wheat spaghetti or angel hair pasta found in any departmental store., , Don’t have a paniyaram pan and still wanna make healthy one’s, , If you do not own this pan, you can flatten the manchurian balls like tikkis and fry on a non stick skillet lightly brushing it with oil on both sides until golden brown . You can call them as gold coins 🙂, , How to bake manchurian ?, , Or you can bake them at 400 degrees f / 200 deg c for 20 minutes flipping half way and for golden brown top, place the baking tray on top rack and broil it on high for 1 -2 minutes on both side. Keep a watch  to prevent them from burning., , You might like the following recipes too-, , easy hakka noodles., , healthy chilly garlic noodles in sesame pepper sauce., , teriyaki paneer stir fry., , , Hope you like this recipe and do give it a try.
